fields.name: IoT Gateway
fields.value: BL10x Industrial IoT Gateways performs as protocol converters, includes Modbus Gateways, MQTT Gateways, PLC IoT Gateways, Embedded OPC UA Server, IEC104 Gateways, Bacnet Gateways,Connect PLC to MQTT, Connect PLC to OPC UA, Modbus to MQTT, Modbus to OPC UA

fields.name: Industrial Edge Router
fields.value: The R10/R40 4G Edge Router is not only an industrial-grade Router that provides wireless network access, but also a rugged industrial edge computing gateway with data acquisition, protocol conversion, programmable logic operations, edge computing, network

fields.name: I/O Module
fields.value: Industrial IO Module is a series of industrial-grade designed data acquisition and control modules with AI, AO, DI, DO, RTD, TC, RS485, RJ45 interfaces for data acquisition and control,includingï¼š

fields.name: Industrial Embedded Computer
fields.value: The EdgeCOM Compact Arm Embedded Computer BL300 series is designed for the harsh industrial environment. It adopts industrial-grade NXP MCU inside, provides RS485, RS232, CAN, HDMI, USB, RJ45, DI, DO and Mini-PCIe  for 4G, 5G, WiFi, etc.
